spec_data.Name: perl-Perl-Critic-Tics
spec_data.Description:
The Perl-Critic-Tics distribution includes extra policies for Perl::Critic
to address a fairly random assortment of things that make me (rjbs) wince.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:04:46 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Policies for things that make me wince
